name: WP Post Links
author: mlazarov

sections.description:
With this plugin you can easily to add unlimited (can be configured how much) links after each post.
All you need is text file with links and descriptions hosted somewhere.
sections.faq:
What is the external text file structure?

Each line of the external file should have two parts – link title and the link delimited by “|”. For example:

url titlet text|http://url.com/

How can I submit a bug?

Write me to lazarov@mail.bg, please, it’s the quicker way to have it fixed. You can write to the
WordPress forum, too, but I read it rarely.

Other FAQs?

I’m collection tips and FAQ on this page
so I can update it more easly.

short_description: Easy way to add unlimited permanent links after each of your posts.
description:
With this plugin you can easily to add unlimited (can be configured how much) links after each post.
All you need is text file with links and descriptions hosted somewhere.
